item.title: Advanced Movement Mechanics
item.description: Movement Speeds Depending on a situation, the team might be required to move at different speeds in order to move effectively as a unit. It could be used to slow down to let others catch up while still maintaining movement at all times to not be vulnerable or to speed up to catch with the others or to approach an objective much faster.

item.title: Basic Training Introduction
item.description: For use by all members of the 101st “Hell” Battalion. Completion of this program ensures a new cadet gains membership”. Inspired by the 51st “Inferno” Battalion.

item.title: Cadets Fundamentals
item.description: Welcome to the 101st! Welcome to our Helldivers 2 MilSim Community, where the pursuit of fun and lore intertwines with the spread of democracy like fireworks on Freedom Day! Here, ...

item.title: Communications Fundamentals
item.description: Situation Reports When someone requests a Situation Report or Sit-Rep, they want to know how the situation is going or being handled. Even if you have not reached a certain objective yet, your superiors still want a clear image about what your plan is to move to an objective.
